title: Stefan Čolović (Serbian footballer)
text:
Stefan Čolović (; born 16 April 1994) is a <a href="Serbs">Serbian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FK%20%C4%8Cukari%C4%8Dki">Čukarički</a>.
Youth career.
He started at <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a>, when he was 9 years old. Although, he was one of the best in his generation, he left to join <a href="FK%20Rad">Rad</a>, where he stayed around two years. He passed through the camp of <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Madrid">Atlético Madrid</a>, and was playing for their youth team. After returning to <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>, he was with young categories of <a href="FK%20Partizan">Partizan</a>.
Professional career.
Rad.
At the beginning of 2014, he returned to <a href="FK%20Rad">Rad</a>, signed, and joined the first team. He made his <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Jelen SuperLiga</a> debut on away match versus <a href="FK%20Vojvodina">Vojvodina</a> on 13 April 2014.
Bosnian Premier League.
After having had little chances at start-line in Rad, he decided to move, and in summer 2014 he joined <a href="FK%20Drina%20Zvornik">Drina Zvornik</a> playing in the <a href="Premier%20League%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>. In the first half of the season he became a regular and made 13 appearances. During the winter break he moved to another Premier League club, <a href="FK%20Sloboda%20Tuzla">Sloboda Tuzla</a>.
Honours.
Proleter Novi Sad
Dundalk
